website_summaries.verdict: A mid-priced all-in-one floor jack kit that is easy to use, but ultimately designed for smaller vehicles.
pros: Set contains a hydraulic jack, a tire inflator, and an electric impact wrench for removing and retightening lug nuts
Safety feature locks the jack at its current height if the power goes out
Wrench comes with 4 sleeves to fit most cars
cons: 1-ton jack capacity is considerably less than other options
This jack kit does not have a built-in flashlight

customer_reviews.title: 12V DC 1 Ton Electric Hydraulic Floor Jack
customer_reviews.text: This is a great idea. I like the idea of having everything you need for tire roadside tire mishaps in one case. I hate to say this but everything in the case has the look of "cheep". Don't let that fool you. I was pleasantly surprised to find out that everything in this case worked exceptionally well. I have to say it again, I was very surprised especially with the impact wrench, it worked on the first attempt and I doubted that it would work at all.
customer_reviews.author: LeRoy Terry

customer_reviews.title: Wow I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Wow I love this thing! I purchased a new 2017 Honda Accord Hybrid to find out they do not come with a Spare or any of the essentials to change a tire. Well I purchased a donut and this kit in case i ever get a flat. I have used to assist other people whom have gotten flats and I just love it. I mean electric jack! no more using those scissor jacks that take forever to lift the vehicle and then you have to reverse to put back in trunk. Then the impact wrench. Kind of odd the way it tightens and loosens the lug nuts. But it works and I had no issues
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: REC'D ON TIME, TESTED AND ITS WORK. BUT UP GRADED TO A BIGGER TONAGE.
customer_reviews.author: Mike K.

customer_reviews.title: Real Review :) its great
customer_reviews.text: Great quality I loved it - the impact wrench didn't work it was just weak after using it one time. I think it burnt out or something. however, I contacted the seller and told him about the issue and he replaced it for me. I love the product. the electric jack is awesome now it's easy for me to lift the car every time. I loved their customer service just great. I recommended. cheers.
customer_reviews.author: Yasser

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Twice bought the product, but the hydraulic fluid of the electric jack was leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice emergency kit to have in your vehicle
customer_reviews.text: Nice emergency kit to have in your vehicle. I tried out all the items and they all performed as expected. Hopefully I'll never have to actually use them in an emergency though!
customer_reviews.author: J. Cole

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: Used it twice and stared to leak oil... the locking plastic latches broke after one use
customer_reviews.author: Peter Campos Jr.

customer_reviews.title: It works great. It is safer than the other electric scissor ...
customer_reviews.text: It works great. It is safer than the other electric scissor jacks i have purchased in the past. I have 2 and will be getting a 3rd.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Something that's nice to have
customer_reviews.text: Something that's nice to have, but hope I never have to use it-nevertheless, it works well, not really impressed with impact, since it works differently than most I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: ... bought this product two month ago and it is amazing. It does all it says
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product two month ago and it is amazing. It does all it says. Pump the air, electric jack and also electric wrench. I wanted to use it during the winter andI love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very unique. It raises high enough, especially with ...
customer_reviews.text: Very unique. It raises high enough, especially with the adjustment. Very unique gadget. 🙏🏿👍🏿🎊🎉
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Perry

customer_reviews.title: i love it, it work just so
customer_reviews.text: i love it, it work just so, in 5min i can change my truck tire and be on the road instead of using the manual one that hurt my wrist and not convenient to use.
customer_reviews.author: Elijah

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: All i can say is I am happy with the product and it is all what they describe it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Armand D.

product_meta.title: 12V DC 1 Ton Electric Hydraulic Floor Jack Set with Impact Wrench for Car Use (6.1-17.1 inch, Orange)
feature_bullets: Roadside emergency kit including Combo 2 in 1 Electric hydraulic jack with Inflatable pump inside, Electric impact wrench, Sleeves, Glove, Battery clamp，and Storage Case
Jack rated capacity: 1 Ton (2200lbs) with lifting range 6.1 inch to 17.1 inch
340N·M electric impact wrench with 4 size of sleeves is able to match most cars
Work with 12V vehicle power outlet, and operate easily just by 2 switch
Built-in safety device prevent jack from falling and keep current height even out of power

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars30 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
